brand.name: GlowFix
brand.mission: Empower creators with clean, private, in-browser retouching tools — fast, beautiful, and accessible.

project.description: Browser-only app to upload a portrait, apply adjustable smoothing (0–10) via Canvas/WebGL, and download results instantly.
project.mvpGoal: Launch a clean, privacy-first portrait smoother entirely in-browser.

pages.name: Editor
pages.description: Canvas, smoothing slider (0–10), reset, download, new image

pages.name: About
pages.description: Optional FAQ + privacy message ('All edits happen in your browser.')

layoutBehavior.mobile: Single column; canvas full width; controls stacked; sticky bottom actions
layoutBehavior.tablet: Canvas top; control panel sticky below
layoutBehavior.desktop: Split view; left canvas (max 720px); right controls card
